body_content.explanation: covering something partly by going over its edge, or covering part of the same space:
examples: The overlapping slates of the roofs in the mountain village resembled fish scales.

body_content.explanation: having some parts that are the same or happen at the same time:
examples: The word has two separate but overlapping meanings.
She had several overlapping commitments that day.

body_content.explanation: in football, involving a player passing the ball to another member of his or her team and then running beyond that player so that he or she is ready to receive the ball again:
examples: Carragher made some excellent overlapping runs.
